Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 1).
maple: f := proc(n) option remember; if n = 0 then 87; elif f(n-1) mod 2 = 0 then f(n-1)/2 else 3*f(n-1)+1; fi; end;
prog: (MAGMA) [n eq 1 select 87 else IsOdd(Self(n-1)) select 3*Self(n-1)+1 else Self(n-1) div 2: n in [1..80]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 29 2014
